entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High zero.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries at times heavy beginning late this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023
